author: Staff Reporter
text:
One person was killed and 12 others were injured when a Bengaluru-bound bus from Chennai in which they were travelling rammed a cement-laden lorry here in the small hours of Tuesday.

According to sources, the incident occurred along Chennai-Krishnagiri highway near Sundampatty when a cement-laden lorry from Vellore to Salem overtook the bus. The Volvo bus was carrying 30 passengers. The driver of the bus Murali was killed on the spot.

The conductor was grievously injured. Twelve passengers of the bus were rushed to Dharmapuri Government Hospital.
title: One killed, 12 injured in accident
